name: Report a Hate Incident or Hate Crime

howToGetIt: CA vs. Hate Portal: This online portal can be accessed via the "Submit Hate Incident or Hate Crime Report" button below 24 hours, 7 days per week on your desktop or mobile device. CA vs. Hate Phone Line: If you would like to report to a live person, you may speak to a care coordinator Monday through Friday from 9:00 am – 6:00 pm PST by calling 1-833-8NO-HATE.
